stripped_text: When your turn begins, choose a server. click, 2 credits: Run the server you chose this turn. The first time a subroutine would resolve during this run, prevent it from resolving.
text: When your turn begins, choose a server. [click], 2[credit]: Run the server you chose this turn. The first time a subroutine would resolve during this run, prevent it from resolving.
title: Tracker
